recommendations: Shweta Singh “Simran is a dedicated, super-smart, and a very nimble professional. I had the pleasure of working with her at OYO, where we worked together on multiple guest experience enhancement projects. She showed exceptional perseverance and analytical approach to solve problems which were very obscure in nature and often involved multiple stakeholders. Simran is a great team player and goes beyond her call of duty to help other team members achieve their goals.”
